scripts.stop: kill-port 3000 3001 5173 4173 && echo '✅ Vite development server stopped'
scripts.stop:force: kill-port --force 3000 3001 5173 4173 && echo '✅ Vite development server force stopped'
scripts.stop:clean: kill-port 3000 3001 5173 4173 && rm -rf node_modules/.vite dist && echo '✅ Vite stopped and cache cleaned'
scripts.status: echo '🔍 Checking Vite processes...' && pgrep -f vite && echo '🔍 Checking ports...' && lsof -i:3000,3001,5173,4173 || echo '✅ No Vite processes found'
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && echo '✅ Environment setup complete'
